post.body: I got it now, it's The Grove? Anybody heard if Ray's on the River in Atlanta is still in biz?
I can't quite read the sign from the street view.
Congratulations! Have a great day!
My first impression: Visual Basic 6.0 and Java. What are they smoking? Waste of space.
Worst thing, Ramp Up is not linked from MSDN area: http://tinyurl.com/5vo8vy
At the rate you guys are going, we'll have Silverlight 3 any day now! :-)
The trouble isn't controlling your car, it's whether an out of control car will ruin your day. More of them.
Having lived in Savannah, where the papermill is downtown, I just presumed there was a strong onshore breeze taking it to TN
No, that's the papermills down there South of the Border
Here is the remnants of the MS Reader Website: http://mslit.com/ The Reader displays electronic books in MS file format.
Well, gee, now I'll have to put up an Oxite-site even if @ViNull doesn't want to try it! ;-)
Just think, the manager handing your that letter is scrambling to find their next job. No time for crafting your notice!
I've looked at several follower profiles only to discover they've been blocked "for infractions"
Just think of the money you could save on heating by stoking your fireplace with timbers from the crate!
Ron G. is now relating Union horror stories about Toyota and other "transplants in America"
Ron G: "We wondered if we were being set up" A real quote.
Ron G: "We were treated with a double standard" A real quote.
Ron Gettelfinger: "I hate Bob Corker of Tennessee". (not a real quote)
BTW, my grandfather (on my father's side) worked his whole life at Ford.
Ford tells me my Sport Trac may spontaneously catch fire at any time. Quality is Job 1, right?
UAW: Oops
GM: Gimmee Money
FORD: Finance or Restructure Daily
Configured the rack server yesterday for Windows 2008 Standard. It will be very useful after the memory expansion arrives (16 GB)
DJIA futures are down over 300. I'm guessing down 500 to 900 by end of day.
A sucky day on Wall Street. No auto bailout. SEC uncovers $50 billion Ponzi scheme.
I just relocated our attic Raccoon to the Norris Dam area. Fastest racoon I've ever seen when I let him out of the trap.
Just caught a raccoon in the attic. Baited the trap with a marshmellow. No more noises and damage in the attic!
The market is speculating that gambling laws will relax a lot so that states can tax the proceedings and make budget.
Does Microsoft Seadragon for the iPhone signal doom for the ZunePhone? Discuss.
The presumed President Elect may actually become President Elect today as the Electoral College meets to determine the winner.
Does Microsoft Seadragon for the iPhone use Silverlight? It has Photosynth, PhotoZoom, and Deep Zoom support.
Loading up my Zune with podcasts for the drive to Atlanta. No Twitter while driving!
Anyone know how early the North Line of MARTA runs? MARTA is the Atlanta light rail/subway. Their Website is no help.
If there is time this evening, I will make a pilgrimmage to Mecca, er, Fry's in Duluth, Georgia. Santa says I need a few things...
I went for the newspaper this morning and discovered that someone stole the large flag off our house. It was 16 feet off the ground.
Good morning! I'm preparing for the trip to balmy Atlanta for the one-day Microsoft Developer Conference.
Anybody know what happened to Microsoft Reader? I can't find the download page and the support site was last updated in 2006
RE: Oak Ridge Christmas Parade. We were clued in due to crowd on sidewalk and all the police cruisers with flashing lights,.
Lisa and I were driving down Oak Ridge Turnpike last night. Suddenly realized the Oak Ridge Christmas Parade would start in a few minutes.
If MDC is just a "one day PDC", does that mean the attendees all get Azure accounts? I can only hope.
Hello! Learned about guns yesterday and did some target practice. Scored 478 of 480 for carry permit.
Just pulled two perfect pumpkin pies from the oven. Watching the original "The Day The Earth Stood Still"
Most used Microsoft Word template recently: http://tinyurl.com/9whg9d
Excel needs charts that display four dimensions. And a data selector that works properly.
Wow, it took two weeks to re-derive my Universal Multi-Dimensional Interpolator algorithm. Now off to the Patent Office!
rumor of iPhone nano introduction at MacWorld
U. S. automakers in trouble? Toyota reports loss.
I think it is important to wear your #santahat at the #knoxtweetup
Hmmm, three days of DevLink in August 2009, at $25 a day. Check devlink.net for info.
I think the loads of holiday marketing spam has finally locked up the email servers. I haven't gotten one email since 11 AM.
Judging by the frustration of snow-bound Microsoft employees, snow days are not on the extensive list of benefits there.
Next thing you know, those bears will be getting in our attic! At least it will drive out the raccoons.
Smokey Mountain Assoc. reporting on bad news bears in 2008. Miscreants are tipping over "bear proof" dumpsters to get inside.
Only problem with buying a Space Shuttle: my hanger is only 48 feet by 34 feet with about 14 feet floor to rafters.
NASA plans to sell retired Space Shuttles. Anyone want to partner the $42 million to buy one? Shipping included.
GM asserts it is a tech leader thanks to delivering great stuff two years from today. And it is always two years from today.
I vote for @wbm for a @shortyawards in #programming because he gives out T-shirts, bumper stickers, and good talks with demos
GM holds press conference on their windfall from the American taxpayer.
I hope nobody was buying $GM for that wonderful dividend. No tax dollars for you!
